RelatedSentence: Head of the Russian Government Dmitri Medvedev visited today CJSC BIOCAD 's commercial manufacturing facility for mAb - based therapeutic proteins .
It produces monoclonal antibodies - based APIs for biological products that are widely used in treating oncological and autoimmune disorders .
The company currently employs over 700 people , 150 of whom are researchers and investigators working at BIOCAD 's labs .
